snippet: The United States Agency for International Development announced the preliminary results on Friday of its “Grand Challenges” contest for new tools for Ebola workers.
abstract: United States Agency for International Development reveals some of ideas that were submitted to Ebola 'Grand Challenges' contest, which sought to find new tools for healthcare workers on front lines of Ebola crisis; among ideas being tested are protective gear that zips like wetsuit, ice cold underwear to make hazard gear cooler and bug spray that kills or repels the lethal virus.
lead_paragraph: The United States Agency for International Development announced the preliminary results on Friday of its “Grand Challenges” contest for new tools for Ebola workers.

headline.main: Contest Seeks Novel Tools for the Fight Against Ebola
headline.print_headline: Contest Seeks Novel Tools for the Fight Against Ebola

keywords.value: United States Agency for International Development
